document.full_text: iran will shift its production of higher-grade uranium to an underground bunker and triple production capacity, it said on wednesday in a defiant response to charges of trying to make atomic bombs.
document.title: defiant iran plans big rise in nuclear enrichment
lines_and_colors: iran will shift its production of higher-grade uranium to an underground bunker and triple production capacity, it said on wednesday in a defiant response to charges of trying to make atomic bombs.
